name: Birdpocalypse
description:
Travel through a town, forest, and pyramid on your quest to stop the evil Naroo from turning the world into birds.

Developed 2020-21 by Xander Tooze, Jayden Rogers, Aaron Bush, and Ben Walker

  • Xander Tooze: Coding, Story, Playtesting, Executive Producer
  • Jayden Rogers: Music Production, Playtesting 
  •  Aaron Bush: Debugging, Playtesting
  • Ben Walker: Art Design, Playtesting

Awarded: 1st Place HS Video Game Design by NCTSA
